thread.title: Tram driver's view of Manchester city centre
thread.title_full: Tram driver's view of Manchester city centre

title: Tram driver's view of Manchester city centre
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Tram driver's view of Manchester city centre 26 February 2017 Last updated at 00:04 GMT 
Footage from a driver's cab has been released as a new Â£165m city centre tramline opens. 
The route passes historic landmarks such as Manchester Town Hall, the Royal Exchange Theatre - once dubbed the "largest room in the world" - and the Corn Exchange, before it reaches the more contemporary National Football Museum.
